brightness.docs:
**, percentage**: Set display brightness in %. Defaults to `100%`

*See also: [ssd1327 Over SPI](https://esphome.io/components/display/ssd1327.html#id1)*

model.docs:
The model of the display. At present, only one option is available:
  * `SSD1327 128x128`
  
  

*See also: [ssd1327 Over SPI](https://esphome.io/components/display/ssd1327.html#id1)*

**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The RESET pin. Defaults to not connected.
